data.persona: I'm always wondering what happens in other kingdoms? Are there adventures? Are they just like us?
data.description:
You are in the Witch's House.
Old and worn by the time that has passed and the environment where it was built, the wood rotted and worn by the swamp. It should have sunk years ago into the swamp but somehow it remains standing despite the ever sinking earth around it.
There's a wood, a building, a Tree, a swamp, a kettle, and an earth here.
The stray dogs is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "desc": "Old and worn by the time that has passed and the environment where it was built, the wood rotted and worn by the swamp. It should have sunk years ago into the swamp but somehow it remains standing despite the ever sinking earth around it.",
            "extra_desc": "This building was created by a coven of witches that used to roam the swamp, taking the children of the local village on its edge for use in their dark rituals. That is until the day a group of witch hunters tracked each of them down and strung them to the pyre. Now it sits as a reminder to those who use the swamp for their dark means that not even the mires are safe.",

data.short_motivation: I want to get into the building
data.mid_motivation: I want to explore the building and discover what it holds
data.long_motivation: I am naturally curious and want to find out as much as I can about the world around me
